radiographic_examinations.findings: Atrophy and several cysts in both kidneys and stones in the left kidney.

radiographic_examinations.date: 4 months after the first transplantation in 2009
radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal glomerular and vascular pattern with mild interstitial fibrosis and tubular atrophy; crystals were not found in reanalysis.
Normal glomerular pattern with extensive acute tubular injury and intratubular obstruction by needle-shaped crystals.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Crystals were absent in the initial donor biopsy specimen.
